name: CSG-4293 Game Demo
description:
Title: SneakOut

Creator: Samantha Parton

Platform: Unity

Genre: RPG

Rating: 10

Target Market: Young Adult

Game/Project Overview: 

The start of an RPG centered around a high school girl trying to sneak out at night without her mom finding out the next day. Will you have the ideal high school social life or be grounded until you're 20?

Published/Updated Date: 5/13/2021

Instructions: Move around with WASD
